00036 #define CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_RECEIVER_1 \
00037 catch( const sc_report& x ) \
00038 { \
00039   uvm_ml_ncsc_set_fli_import_call(false);       \
00040   uvm_ml_ncsc_print_sc_report_message(x);                 \
00041   report_tlm1_error(rec); \
00042   return 0; \
00043 } \
00044 catch( const ::std::exception& x ) \
00045 { \
00046   uvm_ml_ncsc_set_fli_import_call(false);                       \
00047   ::std::cout << "\n" << ncsc_report_compose_message(x) << ::std::endl; \
00048   report_tlm1_error(rec); \
00049   return 0; \
00050 } \
00051 catch( const char* s ) \
00052 { \
00053   uvm_ml_ncsc_set_fli_import_call(false);       \
00054   ::std::cout << "\n" << s << ::std::endl; \
00055   report_tlm1_error(rec); \
00056   return 0; \
00057 } \
00058 catch( ... ) \
00059 { \
00060   uvm_ml_ncsc_set_fli_import_call(false);                    \
00061   ::std::cout << "\n" << "UNKNOWN EXCEPTION OCCURED" << ::std::endl; \
00062   report_tlm1_error(rec); \
00063   return 0; \
00064 }
00065

00270 namespace sc_core {
00271 enum uvm_ml_kernel_exception_message
00272 {
00273   UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_ELABORATION,
00274   UVM_ML_CREATE_SC_INST,
00275   UVM_ML_CREATE_SC_INST_2
00276 };
00277 
00278 extern "C" void uvm_ml_ncsc_handle_sc_kernel_exception_message
00279 (
00280  enum uvm_ml_kernel_exception_message kernel_exception_message,
00281  const char* string1,
00282  const char* string2
00283 );
00284 // return "m"
00285 
00286 #define UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_1(n, m, s1, s2)        \
00287 catch( const sc_report& x ) \
00288 { \
00289   uvm_ml_ncsc_print_sc_report_message(x); \
00290   uvm_ml_ncsc_handle_sc_kernel_exception_message(n,s1, s2);     \
00291   return m; \
00292 } \
00293 catch( const ::std::exception& x ) \
00294 { \
00295   ::std::cout << "\n" << ncsc_report_compose_message(x) << ::std::endl; \
00296     uvm_ml_ncsc_handle_sc_kernel_exception_message(n, s1, s2);           \
00297   return m; \
00298 } \
00299 catch( const char* s ) \
00300 { \
00301   ::std::cout << "\n" << s << ::std::endl; \
00302   uvm_ml_ncsc_handle_sc_kernel_exception_message(n, s1, s2); \
00303   return m; \
00304 } \
00305 catch( ... ) \
00306 { \
00307   ::std::cout << "\n" << "UNKNOWN EXCEPTION OCCURED" << ::std::endl; \
00308   uvm_ml_ncsc_handle_sc_kernel_exception_message(n, s1, s2); \
00309   return m; \
00310 }
00311 // no "return"
00312 
00313 }

00358 #define EXCEPTION_HANDLER_STORAGE() void* icc_root = 0
00359 #define STORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER() icc_root = ncsc_push_dpi_icc_exception_catcher()
00360 #define RESTORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER()       ncsc_pop_dpi_icc_exception_catcher(icc_root)
00361 
00362 #define SC_KILL_CATCHER()   catch( const sc_kill_exception& x)  \
00363   { \
00364     ncsc_pop_dpi_icc_exception_catcher(icc_root); \
00365     uvm_ml_ncsc_set_fli_import_call(false); \
00366     if (icc_root) { \
00367       return 1; \
00368     } \
00369     return ret; \
00370   }
